lexUnit.name: represent.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: portray in a particular way

sentence.text: These powers , which the reformers Ephialtes and Pericles tendentiously represented as ` usurped privileges " , were given to the council of 500 and to the People i.e. the Assembly and the law-courts .
